channel.title: Comments on: Review: Become a German (in just under 650 hours)
channel.description: See Berlin through a lens of migration and difference

item.title: By: Interview: The Taxi Driver | Collidoscope Berlin
item.dc:creator: Interview: The Taxi Driver | Collidoscope Berlin
item.description: […] a decade before Germany officially recognized itself as a country of immigration and developed a national integration plan that included integration courses for newcomers. Orhan signed up for a language course on his own, hoping to learn enough German to study economics […]
item.content:encoded: […] a decade before Germany officially recognized itself as a country of immigration and developed a national integration plan that included integration courses for newcomers. Orhan signed up for a language course on his own, hoping to learn enough German to study economics […]

item.description:
Sophia,
good film and even better commentary!
